verses.roman:
prabhura ājñā hañāche tomā' dui bhāye
vṛndāvane vaisa, tāhāṅ sarva-sukha pāiye

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ājñā—order; hañāche—has been; tomā'-you; dui bhāye—to the two brothers; vṛndāvane vaisa—sit down at Vṛndāvana; tāhāṅ—there; sarva-sukha—all happiness; pāiye—you will get.
translation: "The Lord has already ordered both of you brothers to situate yourselves in Vṛndāvana. There you will achieve all happiness.
